Can anyone tell me how grand was a castle in the time of the "old" samurai. I.E. How many rooms & kitchens? Also, how many acres was the average for a Lord other than the Shogun? I do appreciate a factual answer. Please excuse any improper terminology, I am fairley new @ bushido.
